pin is the pin to ask for writing

member.summary: Ask the card to verify the pin. A popup will ask for the code.
member.returns: true if success and false if failed

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Pin.verifyPin(System.String,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Ask the card to verify the pin.
member.param: is the pin code to verify (if csPin is empty, a popup will ask for the code)
return the remaining tries (only if verifying failed)

member.summary: Ask the card to change the pin. A popup will ask for the codes.
member.returns: true if success and false if failed

member.summary: Ask the card to change the pin. if csPin1 or csPin2 are empty, a popup will ask for the codes.
member.param: is the old pin code
is the new pin code
return the remaining tries (only when operation failed)
member.returns: true if success and false if failed

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ExParamRange
member.summary: Exception class Bad Parameter Range (error code = EIDMW_ERR_PARAM_RANGE). Throw when the element ask is out of range. member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ExUserMustAnswer
member.summary: Exception class User must answer (error code = EIDMW_ERR_USER_MUST_ANSWER). Throw when the user did not answer yet to allow or disallow reading the data from the card.

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ExCertNoRoot
member.summary: Exception class Certificate No OCSP responder (error code = EIDMW_ERR_CERT_NOROOT). Throw when ask for the Root. Used in : - PTEID_Certificate::getRoot()

member.summary: Class that represent one certificate.

member.summary: Return the label of the certificate.

member.summary: Return the id of the certificate.

member.summary: Return the status of the certificate using default validation level (from config).

member.summary: Return the name of the owner of the certificate.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificate.isRoot
member.summary: Return true if this is a root certificate.

member.summary: Return the test status.
member.returns: - true if test certificate - false if good one

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificate.isFromPteidValidChain
member.summary: Return true if the certificate chain end by the one of pteid root.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificate.isFromCard
member.summary: This certificate comes from the card.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificate.getIssuer
member.summary: Return the issuer certificate.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificate.countChildren
member.summary: Return the number of children for this certificate.

members.member:
Return the children certificate (certificate that has been issued by this one).
Throw PTEID_ExParamRange exception if the index is out of range.
is the children index (the index for the first child is 0 )

member.summary: Verify the certificate trough CRL validation.

member.summary: Verify the certificate trough OCSP validation.

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ExCertNoOcsp
member.summary: Exception class Certificate No OCSP responder (error code = EIDMW_ERR_CERT_NOOCSP). Throw when ask for the OCSP response when there is no responder. Used in : - PTEID_Certificate::getOcspResponse()

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext
member.summary: This class represent a reader. You get reader object from the ReaderSet either by its index (getReaderByNum) or by its name (getReaderByName). Once you have a reader object, you can check if a card is present (isCardPresent). Then you can ask which type of card is in the reader with getCardType() and then get a card object using one of this method : getCard, getEIDCard, getKidsCard, getForeignerCard or getSISCard.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.#ctor(be.portugal.eid.PTEID_FileType,System.String)
member.summary: Construct using a fileType and fileName.
member.remarks: No physical reader are connected.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.#ctor(be.portugal.eid.PTEID_FileType,be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ByteArray)
member.summary: Construct using a fileType and its content (for compatibility with SetRawFile).
member.remarks: No physical reader are connected.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.#ctor(be.portugal.eid.PTEID_RawData_Eid)
member.summary: Construct using Raw data for Eid.
member.remarks: No physical reader are connected.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.#ctor(be.portugal.eid.PTEID_RawData_Sis)
member.summary: Construct using Raw data for Sis.
member.remarks: No physical reader are connected.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.getName
member.summary: Return the name of the reader.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.isCardPresent
member.summary: Return true if a card is present and false otherwise.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.releaseCard(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Release the card.
member.param: If true all the invalid reference/pointer are destroyed. PUT THIS PARAMETER TO TRUE IS THREAD UNSAFE. You have to be sure that you will not use any old reference/pointer after this release

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.releaseCard
member.summary: Release the card.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.isCardChanged(System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Return true if a card has changed since the last called (with the same ulOldId parameter).

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.getCardType
member.summary: Return the type of the card in the reader. Throw PTEID_ExNoCardPresent exception if no card is present.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.getCard
member.summary: Get the card in the reader. Instantiation is made regarding the type of the card (PTEID_EIDCard, PTEID_KidsCard, PTEID_ForeignerCard or PTEID_SISCard).
member.remarks: If no card is present in the reader, exception PTEID_ExNoCardPresent is thrown. If the card type is not supported, exception PTEID_ExCardTypeUnknown is thrown.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.getEIDCard
member.summary: Get the EIDcard in the reader. Instantiation is made regarding the type of the card (PTEID_EIDCard, PTEID_KidsCard, PTEID_ForeignerCard).
member.remarks: If no card is present in the reader, exception PTEID_ExNoCardPresent is thrown. If the card is not an EIDcard, exception PTEID_ExCardBadType is thrown.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.getKidsCard
member.summary: Get the KidsCard in the reader.
member.remarks: If no card is present in the reader, exception PTEID_ExNoCardPresent is thrown. If the card is not a KidsCard, exception PTEID_ExCardBadType is thrown.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.getForeignerCard
member.summary: Get the ForeignerCard in the reader.
member.remarks: If no card is present in the reader, exception PTEID_ExNoCardPresent is thrown. If the card is not a ForeignerCard, exception PTEID_ExCardBadType is thrown.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.getSISCard
member.summary: Get the SISCard in the reader.
member.remarks: If no card is present in the reader, exception PTEID_ExNoCardPresent is thrown. If the card is not a SISCard, exception PTEID_ExCardBadType is thrown.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.SetEventCallback(be.portugal.eid.PTEID_SetEventDelegate,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Specify a callback function to be called each time a card is inserted/remove in/from this reader.
member.returns: A handle can be used to stop the callbacks when they are no longer needed

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.StopEventCallback(System.UInt32)
member.summary: To tell that the callbacks are not longer needed.
member.param: is the handle return by SetEventCallback

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.BeginTransaction
member.summary: Begin a transaction with the reader.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.EndTransaction
member.summary: End the transaction.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderContext.isVirtualReader
member.summary: Return true if this is a virtual reader (create from a file).

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ExDocTypeUnknown
member.summary: Exception class Document Type Unknown (error code = EIDMW_ERR_DOCTYPE_UNKNOWN). Throw when the document type doesn't exist for this card. Used in : - PTEID_Card::getDocument(PTEID_DocumentType type)

member.summary: Full document : usefull for XML/CSV/TLV export

member.summary: ID document : usefull to get value by field

member.summary: picture document (if available)

member.summary: info on the card (if available)

member.summary: pins containert (if available)

member.name: F:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_DocumentType.PTEID_DOCTYPE_CERTIFICATES
member.summary: certificates containert (if available)

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Crl
member.summary: Class that represents one CRL.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Crl.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a Crl from its uri (without any certificate link).
member.remarks: As there is no issuer, this CRL can't be verify and some method are not allowed (ex. getIssuer). These methods throw PTEID_ExBadUsage exception.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Crl.getUri
member.summary: Return the uri of the CRL.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Crl.getIssuerName
member.summary: Return the name of the issuer of the certificate.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Crl.getIssuer
member.summary: Return the issuer certificate.
member.remarks: if there is no issuer (root), PTEID_ExCertNoIssuer exception is thrown.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Crl.getData(be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ByteArray,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Return the CRL as a byte array.
member.remarks: If it comes from a Certif we verify the signature. If it's created from the URL only we DON'T verify the signature.
member.param: will content the crl
if true the CRL in the cache is not valid anymore and we force a new download

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Crl.getData(be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ByteArray)
member.summary: Return the CRL as a byte array.
member.remarks: If it comes from a Certif we verify the signature. If it's created from the URL only we DON'T verify the signature.
member.param: will content the crl

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Biometric
member.summary: Abstract base class for the biometric documents.

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Picture
member.summary: Class for the picture document on a EID Card. You can get such an object from PTEID_EIDCard::getPicture() (or getDocument).

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Picture.getData
member.summary: Return the picture itself (jpg format).

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Picture.getHash
member.summary: Return the hash of the picture.

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ExCmdNotSupported
member.summary: Exception class Command Not Supported (error code = EIDMW_ERR_NOT_SUPPORTED). Throw when the command asked is not supported by the card.

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet
member.summary: This is a singleton class that is the starting point to get all other objects. You get an instance from the static instance() method (or using the define ReaderSet). Then you get a READER (PTEID_ReaderContext) -> from this reader, you a CARD (PTEID_Card or derived class) -> from this card, you get DOCUMENT (PTEID_XMLDoc or derived class) -> ...

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.initSDK(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Init the SDK (Optional).
member.param: If true the applayer must ask if test cards are allowed (used for compatibility with old C API). If false other applications (ex. gui) take that into their scope.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.initSDK
member.summary: Init the SDK (Optional) without test card managment.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.releaseSDK
member.summary: Release the SDK.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.releaseReaders(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Release the readers (Useful if readers had changed).
member.param: If true all the invalid reference/pointer are destroyed. PUT THIS PARAMETER TO TRUE IS THREAD UNSAFE. You have to be sure that you will not use any old reference/pointer after this release.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.releaseReaders
member.summary: Release the readers (Useful if readers had changed).

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.isReadersChanged
member.summary: Return true if readers has been added or removed.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.readerList(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the list of the reader. Return an array of string.
member.param: force the reconnection to the lower layer to see if reader list have changed

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.readerList
member.summary: Get the list of the reader. Return an array string.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.getReader
member.summary: Return the first readercontext with a card.
member.remarks: If no card is present, return the firs reader. If no reader exist, throw an exception PTEID_ExNoReader.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.getReaderByName(System.String)
member.summary: Get the reader by its name.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.readerCount(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Return the number of card readers connected to the computer.
member.param: force the reconnection to the lower layer to see if reader list have changed.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.readerCount
member.summary: Return the number of card readers connected to the computer.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.getReaderName(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Get the name of the reader by its Index.
member.remarks: Throw PTEID_ExParamRange exception if the index is out of range.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.getReaderByNum(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Get the reader by its Index.
member.remarks: Throw PTEID_ExParamRange exception if the index is out of range.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.getReaderByCardSerialNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Return the reader containing the card with this SN.
member.remarks: If no card with this SN is found, throw an exception PTEID_ExParamRange.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ReaderSet.flushCache
member.summary: Flush the cached files. Return if any files were flushed (T/F).

member.summary: This class represents a SIS card. To get such an object you have to ask it from the ReaderContext.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_SISCard.getDocument(be.portugal.eid.PTEID_DocumentType)
member.summary: Return a document from the card.
member.remarks: Throw PTEID_ExDocTypeUnknown exception if the document doesn't exist for this card.

member.summary: Get the full document.

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ExReaderSetChanged
member.summary: Exception class Readerset changed (error code = EIDMW_ERR_READERSET_CHANGED). Throw when accessing to a card object but the readerset has been changed. Used in : - PTEID_Object::checkContextStillOk()

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ExNotAllowByUser
member.summary: Exception class Not allow by user (error code = EIDMW_ERR_NOT_ALLOW_BY_USER). Throw when the data could not be read from the card because the user do not allow.

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ExNoCardPresent
member.summary: Exception class No Card Present (error code = EIDMW_ERR_NO_CARD). Throw when no card is present. Used in : - PTEID_ReaderContext::getCardType() - PTEID_ReaderContext::getCard() - PTEID_ReaderContext::getEIDCard() - PTEID_ReaderContext::getKidsCard() - PTEID_ReaderContext::getForeignerCard() - PTEID_ReaderContext::getSISCard()

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.pteidlib_dotNet.PTEID_LOG(be.portugal.eid.PTEID_LogLevel,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Function for Logging.

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_OcspResponse
member.summary: Class that represents one OCSP Response.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_OcspResponse.#ctor(System.String,be.portugal.eid.PTEID_HashAlgo,be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ByteArray,be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ByteArray,be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ByteArray)
member.summary: Create an OcspResponse object from the URI only and CertID.
member.remarks: This OCSP Response is not link to any certificate so some methods could not be used. these methods throw PTEID_ExBadUsage exception.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_OcspResponse.getUri
member.summary: Return the uri of the responder.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_OcspResponse.getResponse(be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ByteArray)
member.summary: Return the response.

member.name: F:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_HashAlgo.PTEID_ALGO_MD5
member.summary: 16-byte hash

member.name: F:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_HashAlgo.PTEID_ALGO_SHA1
member.summary: 20-byte hash

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ExCertNoIssuer
member.summary: Exception class Certificate No Issuer (error code = EIDMW_ERR_CERT_NOISSUER). Throw when ask for the issuer of a root certificate. Used in : - PTEID_Certificate::getIssuer()

member.name: F:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_CertifStatus.PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_UNKNOWN
member.summary: Validity unknown

member.name: F:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_CertifStatus.PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_REVOKED
member.summary: Revoked certificate

member.name: F:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_CertifStatus.PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_TEST
member.summary: Test certificate

member.name: F:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_CertifStatus.PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_DATE
member.summary: Certificate no more valid

member.name: F:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_CertifStatus.PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_CONNECT
member.summary: Connection problem

member.name: F:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_CertifStatus.PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_ISSUER
member.summary: An issuer is missing in the chain

member.name: F:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_CertifStatus.PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_ERROR
member.summary: Error during validation

member.summary: Valid certificate

member.name: F:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_CertifStatus.PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_VALID_CRL
member.summary: Valid certificate through CRL process

member.name: T:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificates
member.summary: Container class for all certificates on the card.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificates.#ctor
member.summary: Create an PTEID_Certificates store without any link to a card.
member.remarks: This store is not link to any Card, so some methods could not be used. These methods throw PTEID_ExBadUsage exception.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificates.countFromCard
member.summary: The number of certificates on the card.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificates.countAll
member.summary: The number of certificates (on the card or not).

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificates.getCertFromCard(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Get the ulIndex certificate from the card.
member.remarks: Throw PTEID_ExParamRange exception if the index is out of range.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificates.getCert(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Return the certificate with the number ulIndexAll. ATTENTION ulIndexAll and ulIndexCard are two different index. Index will change if new certificates are added with addCert().

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificates.getCert(be.portugal.eid.PTEID_CertifType)
member.summary: Return the certificate by type.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificates.getRrn
member.summary: Return the RRN certificate from the card.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificates.getRoot
member.summary: Return the root certificate from the card.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificates.getCA
member.summary: Return the ca certificate from the card.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificates.getSignature
member.summary: Return the signature certificate from the card.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificates.getAuthentication
member.summary: Return the authentication certificate from the card.

member.name: M:be.portugal.eid.PTEID_Certificates.addCertificate(be.portugal.eid.PTEID_ByteArray)
member.summary: Add a new certificate to the store.
